desc: Sommelier-selected wine and wine gifts for any of life's occasions. From birthdays, anniversaries and new homes to job losses, toddler trouble and everything in-between, there's a cleverly paired wine to make someone's day. We'll procure, pair and ship it for you! No matter the occasion, There's a Wine for That!

layout.text: Somm-selected wine and wine gifts cleverly paired to life's occasions.
